channel.title: (P.I Rune-Vision) -Compiler- [Client]
channel.description:
I haven't coded in a real long time, deleted everything to do with rsps...
But i get..
My client gets.. Error: [code]The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Code: [code] @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
This is a PI and it's the Rune-Vision.. Downloaded it to play around with it and get back into coding, But to do this i need to get rid of the compiler errors!
EDIT: Managed to fix the source compiler.. just had to change file names around..

item.title: (P.I Rune-Vision) -Compiler- [Client]
item.dc:creator: @dan_v_jad dan v jad
item.description:
@dan_v_jad wrote:

I haven’t coded in a real long time, deleted everything to do with rsps…

But i get…

My client gets…
Error:

The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
Code:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

This is a PI and it’s the Rune-Vision… Downloaded it to play around with it and get back into coding, But to do this i need to get rid of the compiler errors!

EDIT: Managed to fix the source compiler… just had to change file names around…
